page.title: 07Recreation - Central Park
page.content: Central Park is used mainly for football and stock car racing. Maximum crowd for Cowdenbeath F.C. last season was against Rangers with a total crowd of 10,000. The maximum crowd for stock car racing is around 700 for one meeting. The prices for a football game is Â£1.70 for adults and Â£1.20 for OAP and children. For the stock cars the prices are Â£3.00 for adults and Â£2.70 for children. The football season lasts from August to May and the stock car season runs from March until November. Two people are employed to tend for the football and stock car ground. Central Park used to have a capacity crowd of 25,000 but can only hold 10,000 now. Central Park is used for different activities as well as football and stock cars.
